overview: Nate Smith (Red Oaks, Odd Mom Out) stars as Paul, an enthusiastic team-building consultant who hasn't met a team he couldn't improve... until today. A routine training course spins out of control when a sadistic middle-manager and his tortured team of misanthropes force Paul to question his job. Can it be that some teams just don’t work? Also starring Donald Ian Black (Netflix’s The Toys that Made Us) and Jackie Michelle Johnson (Comedy Central’s Drunk History).
title: Team Work
